MULTEXT-East morphosyntactic specifications for Russian

Appendix A Index of Categories

Up: Contents Next: Appendix B Index of Attributes

A category (Part-of-Speech) is formally a feature type. A MSD always starts with a category code, which should be capitalised.

The defined categories are, in the following, listed in order of occurence. The second column gives the name of the category followed by its code and number of attributes.

Table 25. Category table
Name (en) Code (en) Attributes
Noun N 6
Verb V 10
Adjective A 6
Pronoun P 7
Adverb R 1
Adposition S 3
Conjunction C 4
Numeral M 6
Particle Q 1
Interjection I 1
Abbreviation Y 4
Residual X 0

Up: Contents Next: Appendix B Index of Attributes
